headline: Know your SCM_RIGHTS
keywords: TLS 1.3, TLS, Security, Linux, TCP, OpenSSL, Go, NGINX
description: As TLS 1.3 was ratified earlier this year, I was recollecting how we got started with it here at Cloudflare. We made the decision to be early adopters of TLS 1.3 a little over two years ago. It was a very important decision, and we took it very seriously.
